name: Block Overdose
description:
A game where you can challenge your spatial skills.

Place the tile blocks on the grid and eliminate as many blocks as possible through clearing entire rows or columns.

Technologies used:

- Unity

- C#

The game was  designed, conceptualized and programmed by me.
